attributes.action: Grant all Gurkhas the British Army pension, regardless of their date of service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Gurkhas are some of our most loyal and brave soldiers in our army. However only soldiers enrolling recently have been granted the full army pension. The Gurkhas are an excellent regiment, the Government should therefore grant all Ghurkas (veterans included) the same army pension for their service.
